ComicInfo.Title: Dawn of the Arashikage Part One
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Harada investigates the aftermath of the Red Ninjas' attack in Tokyo and through his own ninja training accurately identifies how the fight unfolded and Dawn and Granny Demon escaped. Dawn is suddenly taken over by Snake Eyes' memories and departs on her own.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 13:49:57. [CVDB643088] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:09. [Issue ID 1763176]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chad Hardin,Jagdish Kumar,James Offredi,Jamie Tyndall,John Royale,Larry Hama,Mateus Santolouco,Miguel Mercado,Milen Parvanov,Netho Diaz,Urszula Mos
ComicInfo.Characters: Sgt. Imai,Genji,Granny Demon [Obake Obaasan],Storm Shadow (flashback),Snake Eyes (flashback),Harada,Red Ninjas,Lt. Kondo,Snake Eyes [Dawn Moreno],Stalker (flashback)
